title: Transcendent Kingdom
description: Length: 8 hours and 40 minutesTranscendent Kingdom is the story of a family from Ghana that struggles to assimilate to small-town life in Alabama.Transcendent Kingdom revolves around a young woman named Gifty, now studying to become a neuroscientist, who grapples with faith, salvation, and science after her brother, once the star of his high school basketball team, becomes addicted to opiods.
author: Yaa Gyasi
